mapper.select: select m.*, r.name role from menu m left join menu_role_relation mrr on m.id = mrr.MENU_ID left join role r on r.id = mrr.ROLE_ID order by mrr.MENU_ID, mrr.ROLE_ID
select m.*, p.NAME parent_menu_name from menu m left join menu p on m.PARENT_MENU_ID = p.id
mapper.insert:
insert into menu
id, name, description, url, component, icon, parent_menu_id, enable, creator, create_time, deleted, deleter, delete_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update menu
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPONENT = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETER = #{deleter,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update menu set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPONENT = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_MENU_ID = #{parentMenuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETER = #{deleter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
